I sort of miss those days when Liberals were reasonable. I do still hold some moderate right wing ideals though.[/bq]
Hey remember when democrats promised they would legalize gay marriage and kept promising constantly that if we voted for them that they would legalize gay marriage; six fucking years into a democrat presidency and you know it's taken to legalize gay marriage in the majority of the states?  The judicial system.  The democratic party are fucking liars when they say they were going to legalize gay marriage; they were just using gays to get elected, but the second they get into office they act as though they couldn't.

I mean democrats initially controlled both houses of congress and the presidency; why the fuck didn't they legalize gay marriage back in 2008?  You know why?  They're fucking liars that dump you into a ditch the second they get into office.  That's all their efforts for the gay rights movement were for; just to get people to vote for them so that the second they get in office they can dump you in a ditch.

2006:
"We'll legalize gay marriage; we swear to god!"
2008:
"We'll legalize gay marriage; we swear to god!"
2010:
"We'll legalize gay marriage; we swear to god!"
2012:
"We'll legalize gay marriage; we swear to god!"
2014:
"We'll legalize gay marriage; we swear to god!"
2016 elections going on:
"We'll legalize gay marriage; we swear to god!"
